summary:
\"Hello, ladies!\"....

Who would have thought of that coming from one of your available companions?
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------
Windhelm Housecarl Calder
(the Lusty Redheaded Nord Man)
----------------------------

My first run through of Skyrim and getting my thanedom from Ulfric, I never adventured with Calder. However, when 

I did my second run through, I decided to give Farkas a break and test out my housecarl of Hjerim. He is a very 

capable fighter, which I was surprised and funny. Take him to the tavern and just listen to him try to pick up 

the ladies. :D

My version of Calder is not much different from Vanilla but I did a few little tweaks to him in order to look 

like a \'proper\' fighter and not so pansy looking.
 
	1. I aged him to be around 40.
	2. I put a little bit of weight and height to Calder. So, ladies, you actually LOOK up to him.
	3. Changed his beard. Sorry, I don\'t like mutton chops and it looked silly on Calder!

To make Calder look like the man in my promo images you will need these mods:

	1. Better Males Project by Chris57 and FavoredSoul 
	   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
	
	2. Seltkirk Armor from the Witcher 2 Models by LordOfWar
	   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588

Enjoy! This is the first modified NPC for me and I am working on others as I envision them for my game.


----------------
INSTALL
----------------

Copy the files into your /Data folder of your Skyrim game. It should then take precedence over the default load 

of Calder when you start your game up. 

Contained Files:
	/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/skyrim.esm/000a2c90
	HousecarlWindhelm.esp
	README.txt
author: Avienda
